tool_description: Generates astrological forecasts and timing predictions based on transits, progressions, and natal chart patterns.

active_transits.description: Current transit aspects affecting the chart.

natal_chart_themes.description: Major themes from natal chart analysis.

forecast_period.description: Forecast timeframe: week, month, quarter, or year.

error_messages: Invalid transit format: Use standard astrological aspect notation.
Insufficient data: Need at least 1 transit and 3 natal themes.
Too many elements: Maximum 25 transits and 15 themes can be processed.
usage: Input active transits and natal themes, specify forecast period and focus areas to generate personalized timing predictions and guidance.

general_forecast.description: Overall forecast summary for the specified period

challenges.description: Potential challenges and how to navigate them

advice.description: Practical guidance for the forecast period
